title: Person of Interest: Reese Hotel Scene (Miami Showdown)
author: snatchingsouls
comment: Lets not forget, he did all of this whilst bleeding quite a bit from a bullet wound to the chest! Reese you badass...
Classic example of a man with nothing left to lose. Best scene in the series.

Reese had a gun shot wound to the abdomin...yet he took out several heavily armed Marshals strategically. 

John Reese=Badass incarnate
Best scence in the whole series. Felt like I was watching The Dark Knight again!
I could watch this over and over and over. this song is PERFECT for The Man in The Suit.
description:
From Season 3 Episode 10 "The Devil's Share" of Person of Interest. 
Music: Miami Showdown - Digitalism
